criterion: Provides an incorrect or incomplete inpatient progress note template
Asks for more context or clarifies the user's request
Uses natural language and correct interpretation for the user's query
Fails to provide any guidance or information on creating an inpatient progress note
Provides an overly complicated or technical inpatient progress note template
Accurately describes the purpose and structure of an inpatient progress note
Does not take into account any potential red flags or complications in creating an inpatient progress note
Seeks additional information from the user to better understand their needs
Provides a clear and concise inpatient progress note template with relevant sections
